creator: wsartori@gmail.com
text:
I'm trying to upgrade our apache farm to 2.2.15 from 2.2.13 and Im getting a very strange behavior. My apache doesn't start with the following error:

"
Syntax error on line 155 of /opt/apache-worker-2.2.15/conf/httpd.conf:
ProxyPass Ping/Pong timeout has wrong format
"

the line is marked below:
<Location /app>
      Order allow,deny
      Allow from all
-->>  ProxyPass ajp://127.0.0.1:8012/app ping=100 retry=10 ttl=10
      ProxyPassReverse ajp://127.0.0.1:8012/app
</Location>

I tried to change ping=100ms instead of ping=100 and no success. It's a very weird behavior in a minor version upgrade.

what APR are you using? I believe before 1.3.4 there was a bug that triggered this msg in httpd.

  *) Reset errno to zero in apr_strtoi64 to prevent returning an errno not
     equal zero in cases where the operation worked fine. [Ruediger Pluem]
creator: covener@gmail.com

text:
